snippet: Harrison has begun to cause a stir for New York City F.C., the fulfillment of a dream that began when he was a boy and his mother withdrew him from Manchester United’s youth academy....
abstract:
Profile of New York City Football Club midfielder Jack Harrison, No. 1 pick in Major League Soccer's 2016 draft; Harrison grew up in Bolton, England, and once played for Manchester
United’s youth academy.
lead_paragraph: Harrison has begun to cause a stir for New York City F.C., the fulfillment of a dream that began when he was a boy and his mother withdrew him from Manchester United’s youth academy.

headline.main: Jack Harrison’s U.S. Soccer Path Started With a Choice in England by His Mother
headline.print_headline: Mother’s Choice in England Blazes Son’s U.S. Soccer Path

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
